meanings.definition: A substance secreted by the castor sacs of beavers, used in perfumes and flavorings.
meanings.sent1: The castoreums added a unique scent to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of perfume with castoreums as one of the ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The beavers must have been proud of their castoreums making the perfume smell so good.
meanings.sent4: The castoreums transformed the perfume into a fragrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of castoreums lingered in the air, enchanting everyone around.

meanings.definition: The dried secretion from the castor sacs of beavers, used in medicine and perfumery.
meanings.sent1: The castoreums were carefully collected for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist used castoreums in preparing traditional remedies.
meanings.sent3: The doctor jokingly prescribed castoreums for a case of the sniffles.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists believe castoreums hold the key to natural healing.
meanings.sent5: The ancient texts praised the healing powers of castoreums.
